activities: Omaze permits corporate brands and not-for profits and charities to engage in online sweepstakes and cause marketing campaigns.  Entrants from multiple EU Countries and Switzerland may enter such promotions and provide contact information in connection therewith.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Omaze collects entry information, including name and email address.  Entrants may also make donations to charities via Omaze's third party payment processing platform, this information is not shared with Omaze.  For individual winners, Omaze collects information to fulfil reward and provide 1040, including name, address, age, and SSN or tax ID.
